name: qpdfview
description: qpdfview is a small PDF reader that can browse various documents in PDF. It also can annotate, print and manage PDF files. You can freely switch to full-screen reading mode in qpdfview and its precise text search function will make your reading easier.

en_US.description: qpdfview is a small PDF reader that can browse various documents in PDF. It also can annotate, print and manage PDF files. You can freely switch to full-screen reading mode in qpdfview and its precise text search function will make your reading easier.
en_US.name: qpdfview

zh_CN.description: qpdfview是一个小巧的PDF阅读器，它能浏览各种PDF格式的文件，并且可以对PDF文件进行标注、打印和管理。qpdfview可以随意切换到全屏阅读模式，其精准的搜索文本功能，将让您的阅读更轻松、更省事。
zh_CN.name: qpdfview
